title: E25 Universal Basic Income with Andrew Yang
itunes:title: Universal Basic Income with Andrew Yang
description:
In this episode, the team discusses Universal Basic Income with entrepreneur, philanthropist, and former 2020 presidential candidate, Andrew Yang ( @Andrew Yang ).

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
